name: Jumbled.io
description:
What a mess! How quickly do you get the word put together?

Jumbled. io - the fast-paced multiplayer fun puzzler for people (and cyborgs) with eagle eyes, fast reflexes and strong nerves!

Find the matching letters in the awesome jumble and move them into the matching boxes at the bottom of the game. 
The more letters you have collected in a sequence, the bigger your points boost will be.
But watch out, other players can ruin your collection success - use the lock icon to protect your collected letters!

All right, let's get into chaos!
